Text: Bro you have no idea how awesome it is to see someone uploading the games. You sir, are a GOD of the Internet. I have n NHL account but I'm in a part of Asia now that blocks access. Without this I'd be lost. Again, you fucking rawk!!! Now if only I could stop catching the final scores on facebook before I get to watch the game. :()
Thank you, clickaroo! I'm glad I could help. YW both, my friends!

You are perhaps the best uploader of sports-and we of the sporting community thank you from the bottom of our hearts Mr. Nepotu!!  I appreciate all the hard work you do and can't thank you enough.
I lost my job and can no longer afford cable so this is a godsend and so are you!!!
